content.p:
ยง 2024. Traveling expenses. The reasonable and necessary traveling and
other expenses of the commissioners, officers, assistants,
administrative law judges and other employees of the division of tax
appeals, while actually engaged in the performance of their duties,
outside of the city of Albany, or if such officer, assistant,
administrative law judge or employee be in charge of or actually
employed at a branch office of the division of tax appeals, the
reasonable and necessary traveling and other expenses outside of the
place in which such branch office is located, and the necessary
traveling expenses incurred in the performance of their duties in the
place in which their duties are performed of such officers, assistants,
administrative law judges and employees as are specifically authorized
by order of the president of the tax appeals tribunal, shall be paid
upon the order of the comptroller upon vouchers approved by the
president of the tax appeals tribunal.
